org.jlab.coda.jevio

Class BlockNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.jevio.BlockNode

  • public final class BlockNode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store relevant info about an evio block along with its position in a buffer.
    Author:
    timmer Date: 11/13/12
